name: Moovy
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

The smart contract is not verified for the following asset, which means the owners may be able to modify contract behaviour (for example: disable selling, change fees, mint new tokens, or transfer tokens). Please proceed with caution.

description.en:
Moovy is a drive2earn game that combines virtual and real-world experiences, allowing players to participate in drive2earn world, rallies, quests and personalize their vehicles and avatars, and win rewards.

The game features a token economics system where players can earn MGAS token for driving and use MOIL and MGAS tokens within the game.

Moovy offers NFT avatar and NFT car systems, which allow players to fully immerse themselves in the game and earn rewards in real-time. The game also features a quest system, rally system, and a variety of driving modes, providing an engaging and exciting experience for players.

Additionally, players can access other valuable in-game assets such as Number plates, containers, and spare parts. The fuel system, avatar garage, and registration system are also important components of the game.

Ready! Stead! Earn!
